content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 3, Sampdoria 2.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 3, Sampdoria 2.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Vasco Regini.
Attempt blocked. Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by André Gomes.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Christian Puggioni.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Foul by Luca Cigarini (Sampdoria).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Matías Silvestre (Sampdoria) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Juan Cámara (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.
Munir El Haddadi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by David Ivan (Sampdoria).
Substitution, Sampdoria. David Ivan replaces Angelo Palombo.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Sampdoria 2. Ante Budimir (Sampdoria) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Luca Cigarini.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Christian Puggioni replaces Emiliano Viviano.
Substitution, Barcelona. Munir El Haddadi replaces Lionel Messi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Samper replaces Sergio Busquets.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Emiliano Viviano (Sampdoria) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Barcelona. Denis Suárez tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Foul by Pedro Pereira (Sampdoria).
Arda Turan (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Luca Cigarini replaces Karol Linetty.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Filip Djuricic replaces Fabio Quagliarella.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Pedro Pereira replaces Lorenzo De Silvestri.
Denis Suárez (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Denis Suárez.
Attempt missed. Ante Budimir (Sampdoria) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by Karol Linetty.
Foul by Denis Suárez (Barcelona).
Ricardo Álvarez (Sampdoria) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Arda Turan (Barcelona) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Attempt blocked. Arda Turan (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Substitution, Barcelona. André Gomes replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Angelo Palombo (Sampdoria) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Juan Cámara replaces Lucas Digne.
Substitution, Barcelona. Samuel Umtiti replaces Gerard Piqué.
Substitution, Barcelona. Denis Suárez replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc-André ter Stegen replaces Jordi Masip.
Offside, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ante Budimir (Sampdoria).
Attempt missed. Angelo Palombo (Sampdoria) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Vasco Regini.
Offside, Barcelona. Lucas Digne tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Hand ball by Ante Budimir (Sampdoria).
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross.
Offside, Barcelona. Luis Suárez tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Lorenzo De Silvestri.
Vasco Regini (Sampdoria) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Vasco Regini (Sampdoria).
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Ante Budimir replaces Luis Muriel.
Substitution, Barcelona. Aleix Vidal replaces Sergi Roberto.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Ricardo Álvarez replaces Patrik Schick.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Edgar Barreto replaces Mirko Eramo.
Substitution, Sampdoria. Milan Skriniar replaces Leandro Castán.
Second Half begins Barcelona 3, Sampdoria 1.
First Half ends, Barcelona 3, Sampdoria 1.
Offside, Barcelona. Andrés Iniesta tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Leandro Castán.
Attempt blocked. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt saved. Luis Muriel (Sampdoria) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Emiliano Viviano.
Foul by Mirko Eramo (Sampdoria).

Attempt missed. Mirko Eramo (Sampdoria) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

Substitution, Sampdoria. Angelo Palombo replaces Lucas Torreira because of an injury.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Sampdoria 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) from a free kick with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Substitution, Barcelona. Javier Mascherano replaces Jeremy Mathieu.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jordi Masip replaces Claudio Bravo.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Emiliano Viviano.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Lucas Torreira (Sampdoria) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Vasco Regini.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Sampdoria 1. Luis Muriel (Sampdoria) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Fabio Quagliarella.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Sampdoria 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Sampdoria 0. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi.

Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).

Foul by Lucas Digne (Barcelona).
Matías Silvestre (Sampdoria) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Arda Turan (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Lucas Digne with a cross.
